narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sierra Savedge is a Counselor, Professional provider based in North Chesterfield, VA. From 2022-08 through 2024-12, this provider received $454K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending grew 568% from $35K in 2022 to $232K in 2024.
Saw a 5.4× spike in 2023 ($35K → $187K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
